title: Cannot Connect to PvP Server
body:
Everytime I join a game, nothing happens at the load screen and the game drops, I'm then taken back to the client with a 'The Game has crashed screen'.

I'm able to talk in chat and champ select, everything works fine before.

I've tried everything I could, uninstall/reinstall, check internet, restarts, etc.

replies.body:
Hey GZPerdi,

Can you try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article and let me know if anything works for you?
